titles.title: Illegal Red Snapper and Tuna Enforcement Act
Illegal Red Snapper and Tuna Enforcement Act
Illegal Red Snapper and Tuna Enforcement Act
Illegal Red Snapper and Tuna Enforcement Act

A bill to require the Under Secretary of Commerce for Standards and Technology and the Administrator of National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to develop a standard methodology for identifying the country of origin of seafood to support enforcement against illegal, unreported, and unregulated fishing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz without amendment. With written report No. 119-24.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 86.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
